general.name: procGimgApo
general.short: Processed image from the APO guider camera
general.description: The processed guider frame from the APO 2.5m telescope, acquired using one of the six Guide Focus and Acquisition (GFA) MicroLine ML4240 cameras located in the periphery of the focal plane. This data product is similar to the gimgApogee file but it includes photometric and astrometric information, as well as the measured position of the telescope boresight and the guider corrections applied.

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: $GCAM_DATA_N/[MJD]/proc-gimg-gfa[CAMNUM]n-[EXPNUM].fits where [MJD] is the SDSS-flavoured modified Julian date of the observation, [CAMNUM] is the camera number, and [EXPNUM] is the exposure number. The n following the camera number indicates that this is one of the cameras in the APO (North) focal plane.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu1.name: RAW
hdu1.description: Gzipped extension with the guider raw image data and astrometric solution

header.comment: The image type of the file
Time of the start of the exposure [TAI]
Scale of unbinned pixel on sky [arcsec/pix]
Units of coordinate increment and value
Units of coordinate increment and value
Method used to solve the field
Time to solve the field or fail
solved RA of pointing (deg) [This and the following entries became availabe in cherno version 1.0.0]
guide rms between reference and solved (mm)
tai seconds at middle of exposure
number of stars used in fit
number of GFAs used in fit
number of iterations for wcs solve
number of iterations for full solve
median measured zeropoint of gaia sources

hdu2.name: CENTROIDS
hdu2.description: Binary table with the centroids of the stars in the image. The majority of the columns are generated by sep.extract

npix.name: npix
npix.description: Number of pixels belonging to the object.

tnpix.name: tnpix
tnpix.description: Number of pixels above threshold (unconvolved data).

errx2.name: errx2
errx2.description: Second moment errors. Note that these will be zero if error is not given.

erry2.name: erry2
erry2.description: Second moment errors. Note that these will be zero if error is not given.

errxy.name: errxy
errxy.description: Second moment errors. Note that these will be zero if error is not given.

a.name: a
a.description: Ellipse parameters, scaled as described by Section 8.4.2 in "The Source Extractor Guide" or Section 10.1.5-6 of v2.13 of SExtractor User Manual.

b.name: b
b.description: Ellipse parameters, scaled as described by Section 8.4.2 in "The Source Extractor Guide" or Section 10.1.5-6 of v2.13 of SExtractor User Manual.

theta.name: theta
theta.description: Ellipse parameters, scaled as described by Section 8.4.2 in "The Source Extractor Guide" or Section 10.1.5-6 of v2.13 of SExtractor User Manual.

cflux.name: cflux
cflux.description: Sum of member pixels in convolved data.

flux.name: flux
flux.description: Sum of member pixels in unconvolved data.

x1.name: x1
x1.description: Centre of the Gaussian profile fit to the marginal distribution of the object along the x-axis.

xstd.name: xstd
xstd.description: Sigma of the Gaussian profile fit to the marginal distribution of the object along the x-axis.

xrms.name: xrms
xrms.description: RMS of the residuals of the Gaussian profile fit to the marginal distribution of the object along the x-axis.

xfitvalid.name: xfitvalid
xfitvalid.description: Whether the x-axis Gaussian profile fit is valid.

y1.name: y1
y1.description: Centre of the Gaussian profile fit to the marginal distribution of the object along the y-axis.

ystd.name: ystd
ystd.description: Sigma of the Gaussian profile fit to the marginal distribution of the object along the y-axis.

yrms.name: yrms
yrms.description: RMS of the residuals of the Gaussian profile fit to the marginal distribution of the object along the y-axis.

yfitvalid.name: yfitvalid
yfitvalid.description: Whether the y-axis Gaussian profile fit is valid.

aperflux.name: aperflux
aperflux.description: Aperture photometry flux for this object.

aperfluxerr.name: aperfluxerr
aperfluxerr.description: Aperture photometry flux error for this object.

valid.name: valid
valid.description: Whether this object is deemed valid. Usually this means that xvalid and yvalid are both true.

fwhm.name: fwhm
fwhm.description: Full width at half maximum of the extracted source, from the marginal distribution fit.

mjd.name: mjd
mjd.description: Modified Julian Date of the exposure.

fwhm_valid.name: fwhm_valid
fwhm_valid.description: Whether the FWHM is deemed valid.

hdu3.name: GFACOORD
hdu3.description: Metrology data for the GFAs, read from .

hdu4.description: Table with the Gaia matches for the extracted sources in the image.
